BERŻ - Il-Programm GAM ta' Rispons għall-Kriżi ta' Skart Solidu
EBOR - Program reagowania w sytuacjach kryzysowych związanych z odpadami stałymi (GAM)

EBOR - Program odzivanja na izredne razmere v zvezi s trdnimi odpadki v širši okolici občine Aman

ЕБВР - GAM Програма за реакция при кризи с твърди отпадъци
BERD - Programul de răspuns la criza deșeurilor solide din GAM
EBRD - GAM program odgovora u kriznim situacijama povezanima s krutim otpadom

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Kriseindsatsprogram for fast affald i Amman storkommune (JO-Amman)

CONTENTS.P: Procurement Reference: 9051-GPN-47981
Project name: GAM Solid Waste Crisis Response Programme
Country: Jordan
Business sector: Municipal and Environmental Infrastructure
Project ID: 47981
Funding source: EBRD, DFID, SSF
Type of contract: Goods, Works and Services
Type of notice: General Procurement notice
Issue date: 9.4.2018
Closing date: 9.4.2019 at 23:59 Amman time
This is an update of the initially published General Procurement Notice 8619-GPN-47981 of 24.3.2017.

Greater Amman Municipality (GAM) intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank), for a project to a series of investments in GAM’s municipal infrastructure, aimed at addressing the City’s short and medium term solid waste needs. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of EUR 100 000 000 equivalent, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— supply of Solid Waste Collection Vehicles to Greater Amman Municipality,
— specialized vehicles,
— workshop.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the second quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank will be subject to the Bank's Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Director of Tendering and Procurement Directorate
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Greater Amman Municipality, Tendering and Procurement Directorate
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , City Hall, Ras Al-Ein, Omar Matar Street, P.O Box (132)

The proceeds of the bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:
